articles.author: Gary Gastelu
articles.title: Elon Musk says Tesla's pickup will be able to tow as much as a Ford F-150 - Fox News
articles.content:
Tesla is planning a horse race with Ford in the pickup segment.
Days after proclaiming that Tesla’s upcoming electric pickup would be better than a Ford F-150, Elon Musk revealed on Tuesday what his target is for the truck’s all-important tow rating.
Tesla … [+1436 chars]

articles.author: Chris Paukert
articles.title: Ford recalls 1.2 million Explorer SUVs over suspension failure fears - CNET
articles.description: The Blue Oval is also issuing three other separate recall actions, including its popular F-150 pickup.
articles.content:
Ford's Explorer is being recalled over potential fractured rear toe links in the vehicle's suspension.
Ford
Ford has just released a quartet of safety recalls, with three of them impacting US customers. 
The biggest one covers Ford's very popular 2011-2017… [+3649 chars]
